ItemCollection.Items:
Bronze Ore A basic ore found in most mining areas. 5 Crafting true null //Regular
Jade Ore A basic ore found in most mining areas. It can be a bithard to refine. 10 Crafting true null
Mithril Ore A rare ore found in most mining areas. It can be hard to refine. 15 Crafting true null
Meteorite Ore An extrodinary ore that can only be found from crashed meteorite.. 25 Crafting true null
Blood Ore A raAnre ore found in most mining areas. It can be hard to refine. 50 Crafting true null
Corrupt Ore An extrodinary ore said to have been tainted by the blackness. 150 Crafting true null
Bronze Bar A Bar made of Bronze Ores. It takes a few to refine this into a useable substance. 50 Crafting true n:1;15
Jade Bar A Bar made of Jade Ores. It takes a few to refine this into a useable substance. 100 Crafting true n:2;15
Mithril Bar A Bar made of Steel Ores. It takes a lot to refine thisinto a useable substance. 150 Crafting true n:3;25
Meteorite Bar A Bar made of Meteorite Ores. It takes a lot to refine thisinto a useable substance. 250 Crafting true n:4;25
Blood Bar A Bar made of Blood Ores. It takes quite a bit to refine this into a useable substance. 500 Crafting true n:5;40
Corrupt Bar A Bar made of Corrupt Ores. It takes a lot to refine this into a useable substance. 1500 Crafting true n:6;40
Soul Pouch Inside a soul pouch is a random item, the stronger your soul the greater the reward. 50 Regular true null
Ardilla Ticket Use this ticket in order to get to Adrilla Island. 100 Regular true null
Manshu Ticket Use this ticket in order to get to Manshu Island. 100 Regular true null
Spirit Essence Said to provide the user with the ability to unlock new strengths. Recieve 3 per level. 500 Special true null //Special
Beast Egg An Egg said to be born from a monster. They can be raised as great allies. 500 Special true null
Mystic Egg An Egg said to be born from a mystical creature. They are rare to find and can be raised as great allies. 1500 Special true null
Forsaken Egg An Egg said to be born from a Forsaken. They are the hardest to tame but if raised properly they can be amazing allies. 2500 Special true null
Book of Creation A book that highly used amongst crafters of all levels. 2500 Special false null
Book of Items A book that is said to catalog all the items of the world. It could be very insightful alon the journey. 2500 Special false null
Book of The Wild A book that is said to catalog all creatures of the world. It could be very insightful along the journey. 2500 Special false null
Book of Souls A book that is said to catalog all people of the world. It could be very insightful along the journey. 2500 Special false null
Datalog A special book infused with magic it should help keep you on track throughout your journey. 2500 Special false null
Zithinion Rock A special book infused with magic it should help keep you on track throughout your journey. 1500 Special true null
Firewood An item used for crafting. It is also used for setting up campfires. 100 Crafting true null //Crafting

Tree Seed When you cut down a tree do not forget to replant a new one. 100 Crafting true null
Axe With this tool you will be able to chop down cherry trees. 100 Crafting true null
Pickaxe With this tool you will be able to mine for unbelieveable ores. 100 Crafting true null
